summary.span: 使用可扩展样式表转换语言 (XSLT) 转换 XML 数据。

span.span: Transforms XML data using an Extensible Stylesheet Language for Transformations (XSLT) style sheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类是 Microsoft.NET Framework 2.0 版中已过时。The class is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)并[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须使用命名空间`http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must use the namespace `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 其他参数还可以添加到样式表使用类。Additional arguments can also be added to the style sheet using the class. 此类包含的样式表和扩展对象可以从样式表调用的输入的参数。This class contains input parameters for the style sheet and extension objects which can be called from the style sheet. 若要将 XML 数据转换：To transform XML data: 1. 创建对象。Create an object. 2. 使用方法以加载该转换的样式表。Use the method to load the style sheet for the transformation. 此方法有若干重载，可以加载样式表使用， ， ，或具有文件的位置的 URL。This method has several overloads and can load a style sheet using an , , , or a URL with the location of the file. 3. 使用方法来转换 XML 数据。Use the method to transform the XML data. 此方法有若干重载，可以处理不同类型的输入和输出。This method has several overloads and can handle different types of input and output. 此外可以指定包含要在转换期间使用作为输入的其他参数。You can also specify an containing additional arguments to use as input during the transformation. **安全注意事项****Security Considerations** 在创建使用 类的应用程序时，应了解下列项及其含义：When creating an application that uses the class, you should be aware of the following items and their implications: - 默认情况下启用扩展对象。Extension objects are enabled by default. 如果包含扩展对象的 对象传递给 方法，将利用这些扩展对象。If an object containing extension objects is passed to the method, they are utilized. - XSLT 样式表可以包括对其他文件的引用以及嵌入式脚本块。XSLT style sheets can include references to other files and embedded script blocks. 恶意用户可以利用这一点您提供数据或样式表，在执行时将导致您的系统进行处理，直到计算机资源不足。A malicious user can exploit this by supplying you with data or style sheets that when executed will cause your system to process until the computer runs low on resources. - 在混合信任环境下运行的 XSLT 应用程序可能会引发样式表欺骗。XSLT applications that run in a mixed trust environment can result in style sheet spoofing. 例如，恶意用户可能会为对象加载有害的样式表，并将其交给另一个用户，而后者会继续调用 方法并执行转换。For example, a malicious user can load an object with a harmful style sheet and hand it off to another user who subsequently calls the method and executes the transformation. 可以通过不接受来缓解这些安全问题对象、 XSLT 样式表或来自不可信源的 XML 源数据。These security issues can be mitigated by not accepting objects, XSLT style sheets, or XML source data from untrusted sources. **脚本支持****Scripting Support** 此类支持嵌入的脚本使用`msxsl:script`元素。This class supports embedded scripting using the `msxsl:script` element. 在.NET Framework 1.1 版中，样式表的证据确定哪些权限授予用于嵌入的脚本。In version 1.1 of the .NET Framework, the evidence of the style sheet determines what permissions are given to embedded scripts. - 如果样式表加载从统一资源标识符 (URI)，使用 URI 创建证据。If the style sheet was loaded from a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI), the URI is used to create the evidence. 此证据包括以及站点和区域的 URI。This evidence includes the URI along with its site and zone. - 如果使用另一个源加载样式表，则可以通过传递提供证据对象传递给方法。If the style sheet was loaded using another source, you can provide evidence by passing a object to the method. 否则，脚本程序集具有完全信任。Otherwise, the script assembly has full trust. 不完全受信任调用方：`UnmanagedCode`编译嵌入式的脚本所需的权限。Semi-trusted callers: `UnmanagedCode` permission is required to compile the embedded script. `ControlEvidence` 提供所需的权限到方法。`ControlEvidence` permission is required to provide to the method. 一个如果调用方没有所需的权限，将引发。A is thrown if the caller does not have the necessary permissions. 有关更多信息，请参见和。See and for more information. `msxsl:script`元素具有以下要求：The `msxsl:script` element has the following requirements: - `msxsl:script`元素属于`urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt`命名空间。The `msxsl:script` element belongs to the `urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt` namespace. 样式表必须包含命名空间声明`xmlns:msxsl=urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt`。The style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:msxsl=urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xslt`. - `msxsl:script`元素可以包含`language`的特性，指定要使用的脚本语言。The `msxsl:script` element can include a `language` attribute that specifies the scripting language to use. 值`language`属性必须是以下值之一： C#、 c#、 VB、 VisualBasic、 JScript 或 JavaScript。The value of the `language` attribute must be one of the following: C#, CSharp, VB, VisualBasic, JScript, or JavaScript. 语言名称不区分大小写，因为 JavaScript 和 javascript 都是有效。Because the language name is not case-sensitive, JavaScript and javascript are both valid. 如果`language`属性未指定，则默认为 JScript。If a `language` attribute is not specified, it defaults to JScript. - `msxsl:script`元素必须包括`implements-prefix`属性，其中包含表示与脚本块关联的命名空间的前缀。The `msxsl:script` element must include an `implements-prefix` attribute that contains the prefix representing the namespace associated with the script block. 此命名空间必须定义的样式表中。This namespace must be defined within the style sheet. 样式表可以包含多个脚本块的命名空间进行分组。A style sheet can include multiple script blocks which are grouped by namespace. 不能具有相同的命名空间内的多个语言的脚本块。You cannot have script blocks with multiple languages within the same namespace. 脚本块可以调用在另一个脚本块中定义的函数提供的脚本块驻留在相同的命名空间。Script blocks can call a function defined in another script block, provided the script blocks reside within the same namespace. 根据规则和脚本语言的语法的脚本块的内容进行解析 (通过提供`language`属性)。The contents of a script block are parsed according to the rules and syntax of the scripting language (supplied by the `language` attribute). 例如，如果你有 C# 脚本块，注释就会通过`//`字符。For example, if you had a C# script block, comments would be prefixed by the `//` characters. 注释必须是有效的 XML 内容。The comments must be valid XML content. `Note` 建议将脚本块包装在 CDATA 部分。`Note` It is recommended that you wrap script blocks in a CDATA section. ```

threadsafe.span: 对象是用于转换操作的唯一线程安全。

span.span: objects are only thread-safe for transform operations.

threadsafe.span: 其他操作不保证是线程安全。

span.span: Other operations are not guaranteed to be thread-safe.

threadsafe.span: 您必须确保没有其他方法的调用对象上在加载操作期间。

span.span: You must ensure that no other methods are called on the object during load operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)并[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须包含命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"`. 此方法加载 XSLT 样式表，其中包括引用中的所有样式表`xsl:include`和`xsl:import`元素。This method loads the XSLT style sheet, including any style sheets referenced in `xsl:include` and `xsl:import` elements. 使用解析外部资源使用没有用户凭据。External resources are resolved using an with no user credentials. 如果样式表都位于要求身份验证的网络资源，使用的重载作为其参数之一，并指定与所需的凭据。If the style sheet(s) are located on a network resource which requires authentication, use the overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an with the necessary credentials. 如果样式表包含嵌入的脚本，该脚本将编译为程序集。If the style sheet contains embedded scripting, the script is compiled to an assembly. 样式表的 URI 用于创建应用于程序集的证据。The URI of the style sheet is used to create evidence, which is applied to the assembly. 有关的问题方法和样式表与嵌入式脚本，请参阅在中 Microsoft 知识库的文章 Q316755 http://support.microsoft.com。For issues with the method and style sheets with embedded scripts, see article Q316755 in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. > [!NOTE] > 如果调用方不具有`UnmanagedCode`权限，嵌入的脚本将不进行编译和引发。If the caller does not have `UnmanagedCode` permission, the embedded script is not compiled and a is thrown. 有关更多信息，请参见和。See and for more information. ## Examples 下面的示例将 XML 文档转换为 HTML 文档。The following example transforms an XML document into an HTML document. 它显示在表中的 ISBN、 标题和每本书的价格。It displays the ISBN, title, and price for each book in a table. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 示例使用下列两个输入文件。The sample uses the following two input files. `books.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/XML/books.xml#2)] `output.xsl` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/XML/output.xsl#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)并[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须包含命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 此方法加载 XSLT 样式表，其中包括引用中的所有样式表`xsl:include`和`xsl:import`元素。This method loads the XSLT style sheet, including any style sheets referenced in `xsl:include` and `xsl:import` elements. 使用解析外部资源使用没有用户凭据。External resources are resolved using an with no user credentials. 如果样式表都位于要求身份验证的网络资源，使用的重载作为其参数之一，并指定与所需的凭据。If the style sheet(s) are located on a network resource which requires authentication, use the overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an with the necessary credentials. 从当前节点的样式表加载通过其所有子项。The style sheet loads from the current node of the through all its children. 这可以用作样式表文档的一部分。This enables you to use a portion of a document as the style sheet. 后方法返回时，样式表的结尾后定位到下一个节点。After the method returns, the is positioned on the next node after the end of the style sheet. 如果已到达文档结尾， 将位于文件结尾 (EOF)。If the end of the document is reached, the is positioned at the end of file (EOF). 如果样式表将包含实体，则应指定可以解析实体 (返回`true`)。If the style sheet contains entities, you should specify an that can resolve entities ( returns `true`). 在这种情况下，可用。In this case, an can be used. 如果样式表包含嵌入的脚本，该脚本将编译为程序集。If the style sheet contains embedded scripting, the script is compiled to an assembly. 程序集具有完全信任。The assembly has full trust. 建议的做法是提供证据使用方法。The recommended practice is to provide evidence using the method. 有关的问题方法和样式表与嵌入式脚本，请参阅在中 Microsoft 知识库的文章 Q316755 http://support.microsoft.com。For issues with the method and style sheets with embedded scripts, see article Q316755 in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. > [!NOTE] > 如果调用方不具有`UnmanagedCode`权限，嵌入的脚本将不进行编译和引发。If the caller does not have `UnmanagedCode` permission, the embedded script is not compiled and a is thrown. 有关更多信息，请参见和。See and for more information. ## Examples 下面的示例转换按标题排序所有书籍的 XML 文件。The following example transforms an XML file sorting all the books by title. [!code-cpp[XslTransform.Load3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load3/CPP/trans3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XslTransform.Load3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load3/CS/trans3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XslTransform.Load3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load3/VB/trans3.vb#1)] 该示例使用以下数据文件作为输入。The example uses the following data files as input. `books.xml` [!code-xml[XslTransform.Load3#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load3/XML/books.xml#2)] `titles.xsl` [!code-xml[XslTransform.Load3#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Load3/XML/titles.xsl#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)并[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须包含命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 此方法加载 XSLT 样式表，其中包括引用中的所有样式表`xsl:include`和`xsl:import`元素。This method loads the XSLT style sheet, including any style sheets referenced in `xsl:include` and `xsl:import` elements. 使用解析外部资源使用没有用户凭据。External resources are resolved using an with no user credentials. 如果样式表都位于要求身份验证的网络资源，使用的重载作为其参数之一，并指定与所需的凭据。If the style sheet(s) are located on a network resource which requires authentication, use the overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an with the necessary credentials. 从当前的位置加载样式表。The style sheet is loaded from the current position of the . 若要使用的样式表作为所加载文档的一部分，导航到样式表的开头相对应的节点。To use just a portion of the loaded document as the style sheet, navigate to the node corresponding to the beginning of the style sheet. 之后方法返回时，位于样式表的开头 (在`xsl:style sheet`节点)。After the method returns, the is positioned at the beginning of the style sheet (on the `xsl:style sheet` node). 如果样式表包含嵌入的脚本，该脚本将编译为程序集。If the style sheet contains embedded scripting, the script is compiled to an assembly. 程序集具有完全信任。The assembly has full trust. 建议的做法是提供证据使用方法。The recommended practice is to provide evidence using the method. 有关的问题方法和样式表与嵌入式脚本，请参阅在中 Microsoft 知识库的文章 Q316755 http://support.microsoft.com。For issues with the method and style sheets with embedded scripts, see article Q316755 in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. > [!NOTE] > 如果调用方不具有`UnmanagedCode`权限，嵌入的脚本将不进行编译和引发。If the caller does not have `UnmanagedCode` permission, the embedded script is not compiled and a is thrown. 有关更多信息，请参见和。See and for more information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)并[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须包含命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 如果样式表包含嵌入的脚本，该脚本将编译为程序集。If the style sheet contains embedded scripting, the script is compiled to an assembly. 样式表的 URI 用于创建应用于程序集的证据。The URI of the style sheet is used to create evidence, which is applied to the assembly. 有关的问题方法和样式表与嵌入式脚本，请参阅在中 Microsoft 知识库的文章 Q316755 http://support.microsoft.com。For issues with the method and style sheets with embedded scripts, see article Q316755 in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. > [!NOTE] > 如果调用方不具有`UnmanagedCode`权限，嵌入的脚本将不进行编译和引发。If the caller does not have `UnmanagedCode` permission, the embedded script is not compiled and a is thrown. 有关更多信息，请参见和。See and for more information. ## Examples 下面的示例将 XML 文档转换为 HTML 文档。The following example transforms an XML document into an HTML document. 该示例加载 XSLT 样式表，其中包含`xsl:include`元素引用另一个样式表。The example loads an XSLT style sheet which contains an `xsl:include` element referencing another style sheet. 传递给设置的凭据访问包含的样式表的网络资源所需的方法。An is passed to the method which sets the credentials necessary to access the network resource for the included style sheet. remarks.format:
## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)并[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须包含命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 此方法加载 XSLT 样式表，其中包括引用中的所有样式表`xsl:include`和`xsl:import`元素。This method loads the XSLT style sheet, including any style sheets referenced in `xsl:include` and `xsl:import` elements. 从当前节点的样式表加载通过其所有子项。The style sheet loads from the current node of the through all its children. 这可以用作样式表文档的一部分。This enables you to use a portion of a document as the style sheet. 后方法返回时，样式表的结尾后定位到下一个节点。After the method returns, the is positioned on the next node after the end of the style sheet. 如果已到达文档结尾， 将位于文件结尾 (EOF)。If the end of the document is reached, the is positioned at the end of file (EOF). 如果样式表将包含实体，则应指定可以解析实体 (返回`true`)。If the style sheet contains entities, you should specify an that can resolve entities ( returns `true`). 在这种情况下，可用。In this case, an can be used. 有关的问题方法和样式表与嵌入式脚本，请参阅在中 Microsoft 知识库的文章 Q316755 http://support.microsoft.com。For issues with the method and style sheets with embedded scripts, see article Q316755 in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. 有不同的方式提供证据。There are different ways to provide evidence. 下表介绍常见用户方案提供证据的类型。The following table describes what type of evidence to provide for common user scenarios. |方案Scenario|若要提供的证据的类型Type of evidence to provide| |--------------|---------------------------------| |XSLT 样式表是自包含，或来自您信任的代码库。The XSLT style sheet is self-contained or comes from a code base that you trust.|使用从您的程序集证据。Use the evidence from your assembly.

XsltTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); 
xslt.Load(xslReader, resolver, this.GetType().Assembly.Evidence);

remarks.format:
## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)并[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须包含命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. 有关的问题方法和样式表与嵌入式脚本，请参阅在中 Microsoft 知识库的文章 Q316755 http://support.microsoft.com。For issues with the method and style sheets with embedded scripts, see article Q316755 in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. 有不同的方式提供证据。There are different ways to provide evidence. 下表介绍常见用户方案提供证据的类型。The following table describes what type of evidence to provide for common user scenarios. |方案Scenario|若要提供的证据的类型Type of evidence to provide| |--------------|---------------------------------| |XSLT 样式表是自包含，或来自您信任的代码库。The XSLT style sheet is self-contained or comes from a code base that you trust.|使用从您的程序集证据。Use the evidence from your assembly.

XsltTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); 
xslt.Load(style sheet, resolver, this.GetType().Assembly.Evidence);
| |XSLT 样式表来自外部源。The XSLT style sheet comes from an outside source. 已知源的来源，并且没有可验证的 URL。The origin of the source is known, and there is a verifiable URL.|创建使用的 URL 证据。Create evidence using the URL.

XsltTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); 
Evidence evidence = XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl(style sheetURL); 
xslt.Load(style sheet,resolver,evidence);
| |XSLT 样式表来自外部源。The XSLT style sheet comes from an outside source. 源的来源未知。The origin of the source is not known.|将 evidence 设置为 `null`。Set evidence to `null`. 脚本块将不进行处理，不支持 XSLT `document()` 函数，而且不允许特权扩展对象。Script blocks are not processed, the XSLT `document()` function is not supported, and privileged extension objects are disallowed.

此外，还可以设置`resolver`参数`null`。Additionally, you can also set the `resolver` parameter to `null`. 这可确保`xsl:import`和`xsl:include`元素不会处理。This ensures that `xsl:import` and `xsl:include` elements are not processed.| |XSLT 样式表来自外部源。The XSLT style sheet comes from an outside source. 源的来源未知，但您需要脚本支持。The origin of the source is not known, but you require script support.|从调用方请求证据。Request evidence from the caller. API 调用方必须提供一种方法通常提供证据，类。The API of the caller must provide a way to provide evidence, typically the class.|

XSLT 样式表必须包含命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. > [!NOTE] > 此方法是在.NET Framework 1.1 版中已过时。This method is obsolete in version 1.1 of the .NET Framework. 设置属性确定如何 XSLT`document()`函数得到解决。The setting of the property determines how the XSLT `document()` function is resolved. 建议的做法是使用方法采用对象作为其参数之一。The recommended practice is to use the method which takes an object as one of its arguments. ## Examples 下面的示例转换`books.xml`文件中使用`output.xsl`样式表并将结果输出到`books.html`文件。The following example transforms the `books.xml` file using the `output.xsl` style sheet and outputs the results to the `books.html` file. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)并[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须包含命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. > [!NOTE] > 此方法现已过时。This method is now obsolete. 设置属性确定如何 XSLT`document()`函数得到解决。The setting of the property determines how the XSLT `document()` function is resolved. 建议的做法是使用方法采用对象作为其参数之一。The recommended practice is to use the method which takes an object as one of its arguments. `args`与匹配`xsl:param`样式表中定义的元素。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. `xsl:output`到输出时，不支持元素(`xsl:output`元素将被忽略)。The `xsl:output` element is not supported when outputting to an (the `xsl:output` element is ignored). 请参阅[XslTransform 的输出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)有关详细信息。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for more information. 此方法可以进行异步转换的源文档。This method enables you to do an asynchronous transformation of the source document. 转换将应用于整个文档。Transformations apply to the document as a whole. 换句话说，如果你传入文档根节点以外的一个节点，并不能防止转换进程访问已加载文档的所有节点。In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 若要转换节点片段，必须创建包含只是在节点片断并将其传递到方法。To transform a node fragment, you must create an containing just the node fragment and pass that to the method. 以下示例对一个节点片段执行转换。The following example performs a transformation on a node fragment. ```csharp XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out); ``` 该示例使用`library.xml`和`print_root.xsl`文件作为输入并输出到控制台如下。The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console. ``` Passing Pride And Prejudice to print_root.xsl Root node is book. ``` `library.xml` ```xml Pride And Prejudice Hook ``` `print_root.xsl` ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)并[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须包含命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. `args`与匹配`xsl:param`样式表中定义的元素。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 转换选择作为一个整体应用到文档。The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole. 换而言之，如果当前节点节点树，而不是文档根节点上设置的则这不会阻止转换过程访问已加载的文档中的所有节点。In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 执行转换后，保留为其原始状态。After the transformation has been performed, the remains in its original state. 这意味着，节点，这是当前转换过程之前，将保留当前节点之后调用方法。This means that the node, which is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the method has been called. 因为提供了只读、 只输出`xsl:output`元素将被忽略。Because provides read-only output, the `xsl:output` element is ignored. 请参阅[XslTransform 的输出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)有关详细信息。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for more information. 此方法可以进行异步转换的源文档。This method enables you to do an asynchronous transformation of the source document. > [!NOTE] > 此方法已过时。This method is obsolete. 设置属性确定如何 XSLT document （） 函数已解决。The setting of the property determines how the XSLT document() function is resolved. 建议的做法是使用方法采用对象作为其参数之一。The recommended practice is to use the method which takes an object as one of its arguments.

Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out, null); ``` 该示例使用`library.xml`和`print_root.xsl`文件作为输入并输出到控制台如下。The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console. ``` Passing Pride And Prejudice to print_root.xsl Root node is book. ``` `library.xml` ```xml Pride And Prejudice Hook ``` `print_root.xsl` ```xml ``` ## Examples 下面的示例转换 XML 文档并将结果输出到`XmlReader`。The following example transforms an XML document and outputs the results to an `XmlReader`. 所需的凭据与用于处理任何 XSLT`document()`函数。An with the necessary credentials is used to process any XSLT `document()` functions. [!code-cpp[XslTransform.Transform4#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Transform4/CPP/trans_snip3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XslTransform.Transform4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Transform4/CS/trans_snip3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XslTransform.Transform4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XslTransform.Transform4/VB/trans_snip3.vb#1)]

XSLT 样式表必须包含命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. `args`与匹配`xsl:param`样式表中定义的元素。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 转换选择作为一个整体应用到文档。The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole. 换而言之，如果当前节点节点树，而不是文档根节点上设置的则这不会阻止转换过程访问已加载的文档中的所有节点。In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 执行转换后，保留为其原始状态。After the transformation has been performed, the remains in its original state. 这意味着，节点，这是当前转换过程之前，将保留当前节点之后调用方法。This means that the node, which is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the method has been called. 请参阅[XslTransform 的输出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)有关详细信息在其上`xsl:output`支持属性。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for specifics on which `xsl:output` attributes are supported. > [!NOTE] > 此方法现已过时。This method is now obsolete. 设置属性确定如何 XSLT`document()`函数得到解决。The setting of the property determines how the XSLT `document()` function is resolved. 建议的做法是使用方法采用对象作为其参数之一。The recommended practice is to use the method which takes an object as one of its arguments.

XSLT 样式表必须包含命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. `args`与匹配`xsl:param`样式表中定义的元素。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 转换选择作为一个整体应用到文档。The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole. 换而言之，如果当前节点节点树，而不是文档根节点上设置的则这不会阻止转换过程访问已加载的文档中的所有节点。In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 执行转换后，保留为其原始状态。After the transformation is performed, the remains in its original state. 这意味着，节点，即当前转换过程之前，将保留当前节点之后调用方法。This means that the node, that is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the method has been called. `xsl:output`到输出时，不支持元素(`xsl:output`将被忽略)。The `xsl:output` element is not supported when outputting to an (`xsl:output` is ignored). 请参阅[XslTransform 的输出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)有关详细信息。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for more information. > [!NOTE] > 此方法现已过时。This method is now obsolete. 设置属性确定如何 XSLT`document()`函数得到解决。The setting of the property determines how the XSLT `document()` function is resolved. 建议的做法是使用方法采用对象作为其参数之一。The recommended practice is to use the method which takes an object as one of its arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)并[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 支持 XSLT 1.0 语法。 supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax. XSLT 样式表必须包含命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. `args`与匹配`xsl:param`样式表中定义的元素。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 转换将应用于整个文档。Transformations apply to the document as a whole. 换句话说，如果你传入文档根节点以外的一个节点，并不能防止转换进程访问已加载文档的所有节点。In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 若要转换节点片段，必须创建包含只是在节点片断并将其传递到方法。To transform a node fragment, you must create an containing just the node fragment and pass that to the method. 以下示例对一个节点片段执行转换。The following example performs a transformation on a node fragment. ```csharp XslTransform xslt = new XslTransform(); xslt.Load("print_root.xsl"); XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.Load("library.xml"); // Create a new document containing just the node fragment. XmlNode testNode = doc.DocumentElement.FirstChild; XmlDocument tmpDoc = new XmlDocument(); tmpDoc.LoadXml(testNode.OuterXml); // Pass the document containing the node fragment // to the Transform method. Console.WriteLine("Passing " + tmpDoc.OuterXml + " to print_root.xsl"); xslt.Transform(tmpDoc, null, Console.Out, null); ``` 该示例使用`library.xml`和`print_root.xsl`文件作为输入并输出到控制台如下。The example uses the `library.xml` and `print_root.xsl` files as input and outputs the following to the console. ``` Passing Pride And Prejudice to print_root.xsl Root node is book. ``` `library.xml` ```xml Pride And Prejudice Hook ``` `print_root.xsl` ```xml ``` ## Examples 下面的示例执行 ASP.NET 页中的转换。The following example performs a transformation within an ASP.NET page. XSLT 样式表必须包含命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. `args`与匹配`xsl:param`样式表中定义的元素。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 转换选择作为一个整体应用到文档。The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole. 换而言之，如果当前节点节点树，而不是文档根节点上设置的则这不会阻止转换过程访问已加载的文档中的所有节点。In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 执行转换后，保留为其原始状态。After the transformation has been performed, the remains in its original state. 这意味着，节点，这是当前转换过程之前，将保留当前节点之后调用方法。This means that the node, which is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the method has been called. 请参阅[XslTransform 的输出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)有关详细信息在其上`xsl:output`支持属性。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for specifics on which `xsl:output` attributes are supported. ## Examples 下面的示例加载到客户表并执行 XSLT 转换来将客户数据提取到一个 HTML 表。The following example loads a customer table into an and performs an XSLT transformation to pull the customer data into an HTML table. 该示例使用 Microsoft SQL Server 2000 Northwind 数据库。The example uses the Microsoft SQL Server 2000 Northwind database. [!code-csharp[XmlDataDocument.CreateNavigator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.CreateNavigator/CS/dataset_trans.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlDataDocument.CreateNavigator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.CreateNavigator/VB/dataset_trans.vb#1)] 示例使用 `customers.xsl` 文件作为输入。The example uses the `customers.xsl` file as input. [!code-xml[XmlDataDocument.CreateNavigator#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.CreateNavigator/XML/customers.xsl#2)]

XSLT 样式表必须包含命名空间声明`xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`。The XSLT style sheet must include the namespace declaration `xmlns:xsl= http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`. `args`与匹配`xsl:param`样式表中定义的元素。The `args` are matched with the `xsl:param` elements defined in the style sheet. 转换选择作为一个整体应用到文档。The transformation selections apply to the document as a whole. 换而言之，如果当前节点节点树，而不是文档根节点上设置的则这不会阻止转换过程访问已加载的文档中的所有节点。In other words, if the current node is set on a node tree other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document. 执行转换后，保留为其原始状态。After the transformation is performed, the remains in its original state. 这意味着，节点，即当前转换过程之前，将保留当前节点之后调用方法。This means that the node, that is current before the transformation process, remains the current node after the method has been called. `xsl:output`到输出时，不支持元素(`xsl:output`将被忽略)。The `xsl:output` element is not supported when outputting to an (`xsl:output` is ignored). 请参阅[XslTransform 的输出](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md)有关详细信息。See [Outputs from an XslTransform](~/docs/standard/data/xml/outputs-from-an-xsltransform.md) for more information. ## Examples 下面的示例加载并执行 XSLT 转换之前编辑 XML 文档。The following example loads and edits an XML document before performing an XSLT transform. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类是.NET Framework 2.0 版中已过时。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 类是新 XSLT 处理器。The class is the new XSLT processor. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)并[从 XslTransform 类迁移](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md). 在.NET framework 版本 1.1 中，应用程序的信任级别确定的默认行为：In version 1.1 of the .NET Framework, the trust level of the application determines the default behavior: `Fully trusted code:` 默认值无用户凭据用于解析`document()`函数。`Fully trusted code:` A default with no user credentials is used to resolve the `document()` function. 如果访问外部资源需要身份验证，使用此属性指定与所需的凭据。If authentication is required to access the external resource, use this property to specify an with the necessary credentials. `Semi-trusted code:` 该属性设置为`null`，这意味着`document()`函数未得到解决。`Semi-trusted code:` The property is set to `null`, which means the `document()` function is not resolved. 因为完全信任才能指定，也不能设置此属性。Because full trust is required to specify an , this property also cannot be set. 使用此冲突解决程序时 XSLT`document()`调用函数。This resolver is used when the XSLT `document()` function is invoked. 它不用于解析`xsl:import`和`xsl:include`引用样式表中的元素。It is not used to resolve `xsl:import` and `xsl:include` elements referenced in the style sheet. 若要指定用来解析`xsl:import`并`xsl:include`引用样式表中的元素使用重载，它将作为其参数之一。To specify an to use to resolve `xsl:import` and `xsl:include` elements referenced in the style sheet, use the overload, which takes an as one of its arguments. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是在.NET Framework 1.1 版中已过时。This property is obsolete in version 1.1 of the .NET Framework. 指定使用方法是建议的做法。Specifying an using the method is the recommended practice. 在这种情况下，后不缓存方法完成。In this case, the is not cached after the method completes.
